official_title: To decrease the incidence of food waste, and for other purposes.
subjects: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

summary.text:
Food Recovery Act of 2020 

This bill provides funding and establishes requirements to reduce food waste and standardize date labeling on food.

titles.title: To decrease the incidence of food waste, and for other purposes.
